page.title: 11Mr.Craggs - Hotel Manager.
page.content: Mr.Craggs first job in the morning is to come into the hotel and open up the key cupboard,take the keys out to the kitchen and then to reception.Then he has his breakfast.He then checks to make sure that everyone is working.He opens any letters and reads them when they arrive at 9.00am.He takes cash and cheques which need to be deposited to the bank.About midday he makes sure that the rooms are ready for meetings and conferences taking place that afternoon.He also takes important phone calls.He will then prepare for lunch.At 2.00pm he writes letters.Then in the evening he checks on the staff and makes sure that the food for the evening meal is being prepared properly.His working day at the Stifford Moat House ends at 12.00 midnight. By Ian Neild.
